column2: Unleash your Herd upon a province, letting the Gor destroy any sign of civilization, breed and honor the Gods.
Send your herds to spread Chaos in a province, destroying anything that the civilized people hold dear and increasing your piety as a Hordemaster.
Beastmen are countless and they gather easily whenever there's blood to be spilled.

Boyz, let'z make dese 'ere lands green and propa!\n This councillor action will make a province with a Tribal capital eventually get Greenskin Colonization modifiers, which have 2 levels \n After level 2, the event will flip the provinces to [Root.Culture.GetName] culture and [Root.Religion.GetName] religion, and convert all the remaining non-Temple holdings into Tribal holdings
Send a Heirophant to quicken the awakening of your servants in a selected province.
